Section.Title: Use in Cancer

ItemizedList.ListItem: Prostate cancer. It is used in adults whose cancer:Has spread to other parts of the body and responds to treatment that lowers testosterone levels. It is used with docetaxel.Has not spread to other parts of the body and no longer responds to treatment that lowers testosterone levels.

Section.Para: Darolutamide is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
